thread.title: This Will Be the Toughest Total-Body Workout You’ve Tried In 2017
thread.title_full: This Will Be the Toughest Total-Body Workout You’ve Tried In 2017

author: Barry K
title: This Will Be the Toughest Total-Body Workout You’ve Tried In 2017
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Trainer: Hannah Eden, founder of the PumpFit Club, a personal group training facility in Fort Lauderdale, Fla. 
Benefit: This total-body workout burns fat while strengthening your shoulders, core, and lower body. Adding minibands to the exercises provides an added bonus by activating more muscles and forcing you to focus on your form throughout each movement. Advertisement
